name: AESTHETICS: A CYBeRGaMe
description:
Philly Dev Night Down the Rabbit Hole Jam entry!

Dive into a technicolor virtual world and make your way to the end to escape!

Play in your browser!

Keyboard controls:
WASD/Directional Keys to Move
Space to Jump, Space again to Double Jump
P to Restart

8/19 Update: A few slight bug fixes and tweaks made to the graphics!
